segments.text: I've got a temperature and my stomach hurts .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long have you been feeling this way ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It all started the day before yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You seem to have picked up some kind of infection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take a few days off from work and don't wear yourself out .
segments.speaker: S2
